details.description: tRNAscan-SE is a program that identifies tRNA genes in DNA sequences. It is commonly used in bioinformatics for studying gene expression and regulation.

dependencies.tRNAscan-SE: The program itself needs to be installed.
dependencies.bash: The script is written in bash, so bash must be installed.

resource_requirements.CPU: The amount of CPU power required will depend on the size of the input file.
resource_requirements.RAM: The amount of RAM required will also depend on the size of the input file.
resource_requirements.disk_space: The amount of disk space required will depend on the size of the input file and the output file.

details.input: The script takes two arguments: the output file name and the input fasta file.
details.output: The script outputs a file containing the identified tRNA genes.
